title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.27 - Animals barred from vehicular levels; exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.27 - Animals barred from vehicular levels; exceptions

State Regulations

No person shall be permitted on the vehicular levels
with any animal except a "seeing-eye" dog. Dogs, cats and other small pet
animals when leashed, and if accompanied at all times by a person in charge
thereof, will be permitted in the public areas of the terminal. No other
animals will be permitted in any part of the terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1220.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
